alert.note: Alert for Converse; Goshen; Niobrara; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 5:27PM MDT until May 26 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Niobrara County in east central Wyoming... Northwestern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... Northeastern Platte County in southeastern Wyoming... East central Converse County in east central Wyoming... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 527 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Two Moon Campground, or 28 miles north of Wheatland, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glendo, Manville, Keeline, Glendo Reservoir, Two Moon Campground and Lost Springs. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 112 and 118. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
